p: AS was effective at a low micromolar range against Epstein Barr virus (EBV) in both epithelial cells and lymphocytes [ 50]. Antiviral activity against human herpes virus-6 (HHV-6) was demonstrated not only in vitro [ 51] but also in a child affected by HHV-6B-associated myocarditis. AS treatment was associated with a decrease in the levels of HHV-6B DNA in the myocardium [ 52]. However, data on the effect of AS against HHV-6 are contrasting in the literature [ 53].
